name: Faux Shearling Jacket
description: Jacket in soft faux shearling with faux leather details. Collar, zipper at front, and diagonal front pockets with zipper. Unlined.

name: Slim Fit Turtleneck Shirt
description: Long-sleeved, turtleneck shirt in cotton jersey. Slim Fit â€“ tapered at chest and waist with slightly narrower sleeves for a tailored silhouette.

name: Derby Shoes
description: Derby shoes in faux leather with lacing at front and a welt seam around soles. Cotton canvas lining and insoles. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel height 1 1/4 in.

name: Lined Denim Jacket
description: Straight-cut jacket in thick cotton denim with a faux shearling collar. Buttons at front and button at cuffs. Chest pockets with flap and button, patch front pockets, and one inner pocket. Lightly padded. Quilted lining in woven cotton fabric.

name: Printed Hoodie
description: Sweatshirt with a printed design and jersey-lined, drawstring hood with wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket, long sleeves, and ribbing at cuffs and hem. Soft, brushed inside.
